name: Lip Gloss Paint Set (brush included)
description:
Our lip glosses are handmade in a smoke-free/pet-free environment using natural/cosmetic grade ingredients with some artificial flavorings.

Paint your lips with flavor *^_^*

You will receive 1 Lip Gloss Paint set. Each set contains four shimmer lip gloss flavors and colors with applicator "paint" brush.

******Need party favors? Ask about our free personalized tags. These will be a great touch to your party paint sets!***

Handmade in small batches with our own recipe (no pre-made base is used in this product).

This batch will include the following sour flavors:
Pink / Strawberry-Kiwi flavored
Red / Hawaiian punch flavored
Maroon / Strawberry flavored
Orange/ Orange flavored

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Your "paint set" will be packaged in a cellophane bag with paint brush and label tag attached. Suitable for party favors.

Please rinse you applicator brush after every use under hot water.

These colors may stain the lips and skin and clothing...take care when using.

*****Our lip glosses and balms DO NOT CONTAIN MICA!!!
Mica is made from pulverized (crushed) rock which tends to have sharp microscopic edges causing micro-tears when buffed onto the skin. Therefore making your lips even more chapped and damaged!

For multiple or combined orders, please contact us for a custom listing so that we can adjust your shipping charges.

*PLEASE READ OUR SHOP POLICIES FOR COMPLETE DETAILS ON SHIPPING AND PURCHASING.

No returns, replacements, or refunds.

Happy Shopping! *^_^*

name: Crochet Baby Barefoot Sandals
description:
These adorable little sandals are perfect for spring and the upcoming summer. These are crocheted with very soft worsted yarn and of course, lots of love. Each sandal has a little yellow flower and the center is adorned with a pink button for sweet finish.
The sandals are worn by slipping the hole over first or second toe, then tied in the back.

Available sizes:
Newborn- 2T

name: Dino Crochet Beanie
description:
Great for imaginative play! Made from Green and black acrylic yarn, stitched well and made to out-last those hyper play days ^_^ Girl colors are available as well :)

Any size for 1 flat rate price! *^_^*

Newborn
0-3M
3-6M
6-12 M
1-5 years
5-10 years
Adult

name: Laptop/ Library Book Bag
description:
Summer is coming up. Be ready for that summer reading list!

Made with sturdy durable denim, this spacious bag will be sure to handle all those educational library books! We love to jam pack our library tote, and it definitely stood up to the test! You will receive 1 library book bag in the same print above without the monogram.

Bag Measurements:
12" x 14 1/2"

Strap measures about 27"

Machine wash and dry. Ready to ship!

name: Baby Blanket & Burp Cloth Set
description:
Our blanket sets include a mini comforter blanket, and two 3-ply fabricated burp cloths. 
Burp cloths can be custom made with fabricated letters or fabric strip down the middle. Perfect for a baby shower gift!

Blanket will be printed on one side, and solid color on the other.  Light loft batting lays between layers for a slight puffy comforter feel.

Blanket measures:
about 43" x 34"

Photo is of a previous custom order.  You choose fabric.
We have a wide variety, so please note at least 3 different types and I'll do my best to meet your requests.
